name: Switch! (Ansh Gulavani)
description:
Check out my youtube channel :) - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIrK_sWM1T0Bx7IItj_bBOw

Hi Guys, I am Ansh and I am 13 years old. I always wanted to know how games worked and here I am making simple games. I have had experience in different game jams, Such as BlackThornProd 3, Brackeys 5, Ludum Dare, and now GeoJam.

I really loved the jam! Hats off to Icoso for hosting this jam 🙃.

Edit(1): 23/7/21 7:03 P.M IST - Have changed the script for potions as they were bugging. 

Edit(2): 24/7/21 1:23 P.M IST - Just found out that sometime you cant pick up coins. Idk what the error is. I am sure all of you know unity So..
